REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2392 reute d f BC-VMS-MORTGAGE-<VMTGZ> 03-20 0048

TEXT.TITLE: VMS MORTGAGE <VMTGZ> CASH DISTRIBUTION RISES
TEXT.BODY: VMS Mortgage Investors L.P. II said it declared a first-quarter 1987 cash distribution of 21 cts a depositary unit, up five pct from the prior quarter. It said the distribution will be payable May 14, record January 1. Reuter
